name: Stickman World
summary:
Stickman World takes place in an underground world after the hero "Stickman" awakes in an unknown world. 
 
Play through an amazing story where Stickman has to solve puzzles in hopes to discover a way out of this world. 
 
The goals for each level are simple and require collecting all the hidden items through Stickman's journey. 
 
The art style focuses on using primitive shapes and aims on keeping a minimalistic design.
